name: Kaljach_Sonmi%27s_grandmother
content: The grandmother of Kaljach Sonmi was a Heptooinian female who, by the time Sonmi traveled to Canto Bight on the planet Cantonica, was long gone. Whilst in Canto Bight, he was reminded of his grandmother by Joris, a fellow Heptooinian who worked at the currency exchange desk in Canto Bight, after she pulled back her hood and exposed her silver hair.
